data.text: Of or relating to particles that are smaller than an atom.
data.attributionText: from The American Heritage® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.

data.text: Having dimensions or participating in reactions characteristic of the constituents of the atom.
data.attributionText: from The American Heritage® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.

data.text: Of or pertaining to the relations of assumed particles or subdivisions of matter smaller than the atom: as, subatomic energy.

Relating to <xref>particles</xref> that are <xref>constituents</xref> of the <xref>atom</xref>, or are <xref>smaller</xref> than an atom; such as <xref>proton</xref>, <xref>neutron</xref>, <xref>electron</xref>, etc.
data.attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License.

data.text: Relating to any <xref>length</xref> or <xref>mass</xref> that is smaller in <xref>scale</xref> than a the <xref>diameter</xref> of a <xref>hydrogen</xref> atom.
data.attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License.
from WordNet 3.0 Copyright 2006 by Princeton University. All rights reserved.

data.text: of or relating to constituents of the atom or forces within the atom
data.attributionText: from WordNet 3.0 Copyright 2006 by Princeton University. All rights reserved.
